name: Adventurer Liz and the Erotic Dungeon
name_original: Adventurer Liz and the Erotic Dungeon
description:
All characters in this game are 18 or older.

"Liz", a girl who lost everything within seconds...
To get her fortune back, she enters the
forbidden dungeon full of monsters...
But...

It's finally here! A fast-paced, exhilarating, comedy RPG!!

[About the Title]
The main character Liz is a tomboy, innocent, and most of all, "pure."
A fast-paced turn-based RPG packed with action and laughter.

Genre: High tension slapstick comedy RPG

[Style/How to play]
-As you get further into the story, the enemy gets stronger, so you'll need to collect materials to
upgrade your weapons and armors. You can also teach your character new magic. No difficult puzzles involved. Just beat the Boss and move on to the next Dungeon!!
It's quite simple, you won't find yourself stuck in midgame.

[Playing time]
-8 hours + additional challenges
